answers.answer: What are your BG numbers?Insulin lowers BG....   so why do you have high BG?Insulin lowers BG,   carbs raise BG,  what do you eat?There is no "silver bullet" as yet unfortunately diabetes takes work.

I too have Type 2 diabetes. And it is a constant battle against sugar and gaining weight. Diabetes86 is right, there is really no silver bullet. Just got to keep on working at finding what works for you.

question: Hello all ,I am a 22 yr old female with type 2 diabetes , I weight about 130 lbsI want to try the HCG because alot of people say it helps lower blood sugar, I am on metformin 1000 daily and also Humalog fast acting as needed per meals . Now Im not trying to lose any weight because I am already skinny , I want to lower my blood sugar and may by lowering my sugar in turn gain weight,If anybody knows any answers please let me know as much as possibLE
title: hcg with type 2 diabetes
